sentences.sContent: He coloured the picture with crayon.
They send letters — one time in crayon — detailing their rights and how I am violating some maritime treaty from the 1700s.
sentences.sContent_eng: They send letters — one time in crayon — detailing their rights and how I am violating some maritime treaty from the 1700s.
sentences.sCn: 他们寄信，有一次甚至是蜡笔写的，详细的描述了他们的权利和我如何违反了某些1700年代的海上条约。

trans.tranOther: a stick of coloured  wax  or  chalk  that children use to draw pictures

trans.tranCn: 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画
trans.tranOther: to draw something with a crayon
